headings.text: We Make AI Work For You

"Our collaboration with Phoenix will give clients access to IBM’s watsonx enterprise AI platform [...] specifically designed for AI workloads, enabling Phoenix clients to apply the latest technologies across the AI stack to solve these challenges and accelerate scientific discovery."
